system:
note description: "Facilities for accessing default pixmaps." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "pixmap, default" date: "$Date: 2013-11-19 17:00:03 -0800 (Tue, 19 Nov 2013) $" revision: "$Revision: 93461 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xmlEV_STOCK_PIXMAPS_IMP
inherit ../interface/ev_any_handler.xmlEV_ANY_HANDLER
create Falsedefault_create
feature -- Access
f_information_pixel_buffer../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_information_pixel_bufferinformation_pixel_buffer: ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER -- Pixel buffer symbolizing a piece of information. do Result := ../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_pixmap_from_stock_idpixmap_from_stock_id (create {../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING}.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_set_with_eiffel_stringset_with_eiffel_string ("gtk-dialog-info")) end
f_error_pixel_buffer../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_error_pixel_buffererror_pixel_buffer: ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER -- Pixel buffer symbolizing an error. do Result := ../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_pixmap_from_stock_idpixmap_from_stock_id (create {../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING}.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_set_with_eiffel_stringset_with_eiffel_string ("gtk-dialog-error")) end
f_warning_pixel_buffer../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_warning_pixel_bufferwarning_pixel_buffer: ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER -- Pixel buffer symbolizing a warning. do Result := ../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_pixmap_from_stock_idpixmap_from_stock_id (create {../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING}.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_set_with_eiffel_stringset_with_eiffel_string ("gtk-dialog-warning")) end
f_question_pixel_buffer../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_question_pixel_bufferquestion_pixel_buffer: ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER -- Pixel buffer symbolizing a question. do Result := ../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_pixmap_from_stock_idpixmap_from_stock_id (create {../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING}.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_set_with_eiffel_stringset_with_eiffel_string ("gtk-dialog-question")) end
f_information_pixmap../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_information_pixmapinformation_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Pixmap symbolizing a piece of information. do Result := create {attached ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP}.../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_make_with_pixel_buffermake_with_pixel_buffer (../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_pixmap_from_stock_idpixmap_from_stock_id (create {../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING}.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_set_with_eiffel_stringset_with_eiffel_string ("gtk-dialog-info"))) end
f_error_pixmap../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_error_pixmaperror_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Pixmap symbolizing an error. do Result := create {attached ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP}.../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_make_with_pixel_buffermake_with_pixel_buffer (../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_pixmap_from_stock_idpixmap_from_stock_id (create {../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING}.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_set_with_eiffel_stringset_with_eiffel_string ("gtk-dialog-error"))) end
f_warning_pixmap../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_warning_pixmapwarning_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Pixmap symbolizing a warning. do Result := create {attached ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP}.../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_make_with_pixel_buffermake_with_pixel_buffer (../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_pixmap_from_stock_idpixmap_from_stock_id (create {../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING}.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_set_with_eiffel_stringset_with_eiffel_string ("gtk-dialog-warning"))) end
f_question_pixmap../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_question_pixmapquestion_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Pixmap symbolizing a question. do Result := create {attached ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP}.../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_make_with_pixel_buffermake_with_pixel_buffer (../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_pixmap_from_stock_idpixmap_from_stock_id (create {../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING}.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_set_with_eiffel_stringset_with_eiffel_string ("gtk-dialog-question"))) end
f_collate_pixmap../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_collate_pixmapcollate_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Pixmap symbolizing collated printing. local pixmap_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmap_imp.xmlEV_PIXMAP_IMP do create Result pixmap_imp ?= Result.../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation check pixmap_imp /= Void then end pixmap_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmap_imp.xml#f_set_from_xpm_dataset_from_xpm_data (../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_collate_pixmap_xpmcollate_pixmap_xpm) end
f_no_collate_pixmap../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_no_collate_pixmapno_collate_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Pixmap symbolizing non collated printing. local pixmap_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmap_imp.xmlEV_PIXMAP_IMP do create Result pixmap_imp ?= Result.../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation check pixmap_imp /= Void then end pixmap_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmap_imp.xml#f_set_from_xpm_dataset_from_xpm_data (../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_no_collate_pixmap_xpmno_collate_pixmap_xpm) end
f_landscape_pixmap../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_landscape_pixmaplandscape_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Pixmap symbolizing landscape printing. local pixmap_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmap_imp.xmlEV_PIXMAP_IMP do create Result pixmap_imp ?= Result.../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation check pixmap_imp /= Void then end pixmap_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmap_imp.xml#f_set_from_xpm_dataset_from_xpm_data (../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_landscape_pixmap_xpmlandscape_pixmap_xpm) end
f_portrait_pixmap../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_portrait_pixmapportrait_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Pixmap symbolizing portrait printing. local pixmap_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmap_imp.xmlEV_PIXMAP_IMP do create Result pixmap_imp ?= Result.../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation check pixmap_imp /= Void then end pixmap_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmap_imp.xml#f_set_from_xpm_dataset_from_xpm_data (../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_portrait_pixmap_xpmportrait_pixmap_xpm) end
f_default_window_icon../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_default_window_icondefault_window_icon: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Pixmap used as default icon for new windows. local pixmap_imp: ../implementation_interface/ev_pixmap_i.xmlEV_PIXMAP_I do create Result pixmap_imp := Result.../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation pixmap_imp.../implementation_interface/ev_pixmap_i.xml#f_set_with_defaultset_with_default end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_pixmap_from_stock_id../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_pixmap_from_stock_idpixmap_from_stock_id (a_stock_id: ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING): ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER -- Retrieve pixmap from gtk stock id local a_cs: ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING pixbuf_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixel_buffer_imp.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER_IMP retried: FalseBOOLEAN do if not retried then a_cs := a_stock_id create Result pixbuf_imp ?= Result.../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xml#f_implementationimplementation check pixbuf_imp /= Void then end pixbuf_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixel_buffer_imp.xml#f_set_from_stock_idset_from_stock_id (a_cs.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_itemitem) else create Result end rescue retried := True retry end
feature {../interface/ev_any_handler.xmlEV_ANY_HANDLER, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Externals
